features.featureDescription: Azure Role-Based Access Control (Azure RBAC) can be used to managed access to service's data plane actions.
features.featureGuidance: Use Azure RBAC to create and assign roles within your security operations team to grant appropriate access to Microsoft Sentinel. The different roles give you fine-grained control over what Microsoft Sentinel users can see and do. Azure roles can be assigned in the Microsoft Sentinel workspace directly, or in a subscription or resource group that the workspace belongs to, which Microsoft Sentinel inherits.
features.customerActionsDescription: Follow just enough administration (least privilege) principle
